submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList as sl 
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]: 
        res = sl()
        ans = [] 
        d = n - 1 
        for i, j in queries : 
            if res == [] : 
                res.add([i, j]) 
                d -= j - i - 1 
            else : 
                idx = bisect_left(res, [i, 0]) 
                if 0 <= idx - 1 < len(res) and res[idx - 1][1] == j : 
                    ans.append(d)
                    continue  
                elif 0 <= idx - 1 < len(res) and res[idx - 1][0] < i and j < res[idx - 1][1] : 
                    ans.append(d) 
                    continue  
                elif 0 <= idx < len(res) and res[idx][1] == j : 
                    if res[idx][0] < i : 
                        ans.append(d)
                        continue 
                    r = bisect_left(res, [j, 0])
                    # print(r, idx)
                    d += 1 
                    d -= r - idx 
                    for i in range(idx, r - 1) : 
                        d -= res[i + 1][0] - res[i][1] 
                    d -= j - res[r - 1][1]
                    d -= res[idx][0] - i 
                    res[idx][0] = i 
                elif idx < len(res) and res[idx][0] == i : 
                    if res[idx][1] > j : 
                        ans.append(d) 
                        continue  
                    r = bisect_right(res, [j, 0])
                    d += 1 
                    d -= r - idx 
                    for i in range(idx, r - 1) : 
                        d -= res[i + 1][0] - res[i][1] 
                    d -= j - res[r - 1][1]
                    res[idx][1] = j 
                elif 0 <= idx < len(res) and res[idx][0] > i and res[idx][1] < j : 
                    r = bisect_right(res, [j, 0])
                    d += 1 
                    d -= r - idx 
                    print(r, idx) 
                    for i in range(idx, r - 1) : 
                        d -= res[i + 1][0] - res[i][1] 
                    d -= j - res[r - 1][1]
                    d -= res[idx][0] - i 
                    res[idx][0] = i 
                    res[idx][1] = j 
                else : 
                    idx = bisect_left(res, [i, j]) 
                    res.add([i, j]) 
                    d -= j - i - 1 
            ans.append(d) 
        return ans
